title: Lawful Money Held, National Banks, Central Reserve Cities for United States
notes:
Data Were Computed By NBER From "Specie" Plus "Legal Tender Notes" Plus "U.S. Certificates Of Deposit" Where Itemized Separately. Data Are For New York, Chicago, And St. Louis. Monthly Coverage Varies From Year To Year. All Years Have Scattered Five Month Coverage, Except For 1882 Which Has Coverage Only For October And December. Source: Computed By NBER From Annual Reports Of The Comptroller Of The Currency.

This NBER data series m14013 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14013
